entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 15. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
